Name: The Marian Hegemony
Details: The Marian Hegemony is a small Periphery state, located anti-spinward of the Magistracy of Canopus. Not much more than a bandit kingdom, the Hegemony is based off of the long dead society of pre-spaceflight Rome. Ruled by Imperator Marius O'Reilly, the Hegemony is a strict absolute monarchy with a rigid social structure.
